ResetPasswordTips: If you have forgotten or have not set up your email, please contact your administrator to reset your password
SignupUnOpen: Administrator has not opened public registration
SignupSubmitted: Registration request has been submitted, please wait for administrator review

VCodeSentMail: The verification code has been sent to the mailbox
PasswordRepeatWrong: The new password entered twice is inconsistent
EmailAccountUnsetTips: The mail service account is not configured, please contact the administrator to configure
